project02.name: Financial Fraud Detection RF XGBoost
project02.description: This project focuses on developing a robust fraud detection system using machine learning algorithms. It compares the performance of two popular ensemble methods: Random Forest and XGBoost, in classifying financial transactions as fraudulent or legitimate. The models are trained and evaluated on a real-world financial dataset.
project02.technologies: random forest, xgboost, scikit-learn, pandas, numpy

project03.name: Cromo Financiamentos
project03.description: Car financing system developed with Django, Next, Shadcn, Docker, Kubernetes and Git.

project04.name: GPT4 LangChain Chatbot
project04.description: This project showcases the development of an intelligent chatbot using the powerful GPT-4 language model and the LangChain framework. It demonstrates how to build a conversational AI capable of understanding and responding to user queries in a natural and engaging way.

project05.name: MSX API v1.0
project05.description: A RESTful API in Python, using FastAPI, that allows the creation, reading, updating and deleting of vehicle records, with basic authentication and automatic documentation. It was built with TDD and uses libraries like pydantic, SQL Alchemy, Alembic, PyJWT, argon2.
project05.technologies: python, fastapi, sql alchemy, alembic, pyjwt, argon2, pydantic

project06.name: Space
project06.description: Space Backend - A robust backend built with Laravel, offering a RESTful API for the frontend. It uses modern architecture patterns to ensure scalability and maintainability.
project06.technologies: PHP, Laravel, MySQL, Docker, Kubernetes, Git

curriculum.name: Leandro Damasio
curriculum.headline: Principal Software Engineer | AI/ML Specialist | Cloud and DevOps Engineer
curriculum.resume: Full-Stack Software Engineer and AI/ML Specialist, with over 10 years of experience in architecting and implementing scalable data products, advanced predictive models and robust cloud-native solutions. Demonstrates broad expertise across the full software development lifecycle, encompassing design architecture, implementation and automation of DevOps, across industrial, financial, commercial and research sectors. Employs asynchronous communication and distributed task management to build highly optimized systems, ensuring secure and stable performance to meet critical business demands. Committed to agile methodologies, promoting customer engagement and continuous delivery.

ProfessionalExperience.Title: Technical Lead and Principal Software Engineer
Description: Led the modernization of legacy systems by designing a cloud-native SaaS platform, accelerating the deployment of new features by 85% through the use of microservices and optimization of CI/CD.
Architected event-driven workflows using Kubernetes, Istio and ArgoCD, reducing infrastructure costs by 30%.
Led cross-functional teams to deliver full-stack products with React, FastAPI and AWS.
Developed innovative AI products using generative AI APIs to create personalized user experiences.

ProfessionalExperience.Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description: Reformulated the search engine of the FAPESP Virtual Library (Apache Solr), improving the response time of queries by 37% through the optimization of data indexing.
Directed a global full-stack team to deliver a Laravel-based application for academic research funding.
Resolved critical bugs in Django systems, improving the stability for over 500,000 monthly users.

ProfessionalExperience.Title: Software Engineer
Description: Automated data pipelines using Node.js and AWS, reducing manual processing time by 50%.
Integrated Google Cloud Document AI for automated document analysis, increasing operational efficiency.
Developed and implemented custom smart contracts on the Ethereum network, ensuring the security and integrity of cryptocurrency transactions.

ProfessionalExperience.Title: Software Engineer
Description: Designed a scalable data lake with Hadoop and Spark, enabling real-time analysis for enterprise clients.
Reduced deployment cycles by 23% by automating CI/CD pipelines (ArgoCD, Docker).
Delivered full-stack applications using React and Nest.js for financial sector clients.

Education.Degree: Master of Public Administration and Government

KeyAchievements.Description: Implemented MLOps pipelines with Kubeflow to train and deploy demand forecasting models, reducing training time by 40% and improving model accuracy by 14%.
Migrated over 17 legacy systems to AWS/GCP, achieving 99.9% uptime.
Led over 8 end-to-end product launches across various sectors, from fintech to R&D.
